articles.title: South Africa Fire Tragedy: At least 63 killed in Johannesburg fire, death toll expected to rise - Times of India
articles.description: A devastating fire in a suspected hijacked five-story building in Marshalltown, Johannesburg, claimed over 63 lives and left over 40 individuals injured. The fire, which occurred in the early hours of August 31st, halted firefighting operations as au
